page.title: List of Talkin' 'Bout Your Generation episodes (series 2)

{{DISPLAYTITLE:List of ''Talkin' 'Bout Your Generation'' episodes (series 2)}} {{Infobox television season |season_name = {{nowrap|Talkin' 'Bout Your Generation}}
Series 2 |bgcolour = #FF0038 |fgcolour = #FFFFFF |image = |caption = |show_name = Talkin' 'Bout Your Generation |country = [[Australia]] |num_episodes = 26 |network = [[Network Ten]] |first_aired = {{Start date|2010|2|7|df=yes}} |last_aired = {{End date|2010|11|23|df=yes}} |prev_series = [[List of Talkin' 'Bout Your Generation episodes (series 1)|Series 1]] |next_series = [[List of Talkin' 'Bout Your Generation episodes (series 3)|Series 3]] }} The '''second series''' of ''[[Talkin' 'Bout Your Generation]]'', an Australian [[game show]], consists of 26 episodes and began airing on 7 February 2010 on [[Network Ten]] in Australia. The series was split into two blocks, both airing in 2010. The first ten episodes were broadcast until 18 April, and the second block consisting of a further 16 episodes aired from 1 August to 23 November. Additionally, a [[Clip show|highlights]] special, dubbed ''Family Assortment'', aired on 4 April 2010. {{Talkin' 'Bout Your Generation Summary}} ==Series 2== {| border="1" cellpadding="4" 48|url=http://www.tvtonight.com.au/2010/11/week-48-3.html|publisher=TV Tonight|accessdate=24 November 2010|date=22 November 2010}} }} |} ==Notes== {{refbegin}} a. {{note|1}}The series 2 premiere featured a special [[3D television|3D]] segment requiring [[Anaglyph image|anaglyphic]] glasses.[http://www.smh.com.au/digital-life/hometech/australian-broadcasters-dabble-in-3d-tv-20100118-mfej.html Australian broadcasters dabble in 3D TV ] Ten made the glasses available in copies of ''[[Woman's Day (Australian magazine)|Woman's Day]]'' and ''[[TV Week]]'' magazines in the lead up to the broadcast. b. {{note|2}}Returning after a two week break for the [[2010 Commonwealth Games]]. c. {{note|3}}A [[Halloween]] themed special.{{cite web|title=I've never seen a horror movie|url=http://ten.com.au/video.htm?movideo_p=40632&movideo_m=73457|work=Video|publisher=Network Ten|accessdate=9 October 2010}} d. {{note|4}}A [[Christmas]] themed special. {{refend}}
